title: Dino Stones
description: Prehistoric curling meets chaos! Slide stones toward the target, then zap them with growth rays to knock out opponents. Closest to center wins!
controls: HOLD SPACE to charge launch power, RELEASE to throw stone. Press Z to fire growth ray (3s cooldown). Gamepad: A button to launch, X button for growth ray.
howToPlay: Take turns launching stones at the target rings. After launching, use your growth ray to enlarge your stones and bump opponents away. Center ring = 3 points, middle = 2 points, outer = 1 point. Play 3 rounds, highest total score wins!
